nodes.text: Linapim was a female Cathar who lived during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. She worked in the Olaris spaceport's mess hall in the bombed city world, Taris.
Linapim first appeared in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare in 2011, as a social item vendor in the Olaris Mess Hall, Taris.
